works.name: asyncRace
works.title: async-race

To the all his collection of cars to be precise. He is eager to create kind of drag-racing competition in order to discover which car fastest. !!! To work, you need to start the server locally. The description is on GitHub.

works.name: christmas
works.title: Christmas
works.description: A game where you can choose your favorite toys, decorate a Christmas tree and make a lovely card for your friends and family. This is a single page application.

works.name: artquiz
works.title: Art Quiz
works.description: An entertaining game for art lovers that has two game modes - artist quiz or picture quiz. In the settings, you can change the language, select a time mode, turn on or turn off the sound. Local storage stores data about completed rounds and the settings. This game is a single page application.

works.name: momentum
works.title: Momentum
works.description: Analog of a Chrome application . The app shows the time, date and weather. The background image and greeting change depending on the time of day. The app also has an image slider, an audio player, a quote block, a todo list and a lot of configuration options (language, list of blocks, image source, image categories). Local storage stores a user name and a selected location.

works.name: rslang
works.title: RS Lang
works.description: RS Lang is an application for learning foreign words with the technique of interval repetition, tracking individual progress and mini-games.

works.name: trello
works.title: Trello Clone
works.description: A project management system is an application that helps an individual in a team or a group of developers achieve their goals.

works.name: math-game
works.title: Math-Game
works.description: A game for the development of memory. You can choose the difficulty and pictures, and you can also play for a while.

works.name: Sapper
works.title: Sapper
works.description: Game from Windows. Which was removed from Windows 10. Find all the bombs on the field.

works.name: seabattle
works.title: Sea Battle
works.description: A game from childhood. Arrange the ships in the dock yourself or leave it to the computer. And go into battle against the computer.
